intro_text: Hey, I'm a Software Developer with an emphasis on Frontend, and a passion for Machine Learning and AI. I'm dedicated to creating impactful work in the world. Explore my virtual homespace.
intro_text_1: Hey, I'm a Software Developer with an emphasis on Frontend, and a passion for Machine Learning and AI.
intro_text_2: I'm dedicated to creating impactful work in the world. Explore my virtual homespace.
about_text: When I was 7 years old, an earthquake hit my home town L'Aquila, in Abruzzo, Italy. Everything I had grown up around was gone. My family and I moved around countless times and faced hardships together, eventually moving to Chicago 8 or so years ago. Recently, I obtained my citizenship from the United States, and graduated with a double major in Computer Science and Data Science. Currently I am studying ML and AI, and restlessly learning new programming skills.
